turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, how are you doing today? I wanted to order some coffee from Peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi! there?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: how can i help you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what drink do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want to pick up a cold brew fog latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds delicious and what size do you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get a large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will that be all for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ah, can you make it with soy?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i'll add soy to your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. No, I just want the latte made with soy milk instead of regular milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: large cold brew fog latte with soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to place the order right now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, your drink has been ordered. It will be ready for pick up shortly at the peet's on hamilton avenue.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy!
